description: Defines the EmptyState widget, a reusable Flutter widget for displaying placeholder or empty states with an icon, title, message, and optional action button.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A Flutter widget for displaying an empty or placeholder state with customizable icon, message, and optional action.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Constructor for the EmptyState widget, initializing required parameters like icon, title, message, and optional parameters like actionLabel, onAction, iconColor.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the EmptyState, including icon, title, message, and optional action button.
